name: YoloMancer
description:
YoloMancer! Made for GAMEHIGHED Jam. Theme: YOLO Description:

A mage passes through a portal and gets teleported to an castle of some sort and tries to escape it. But in order to escape the castle the mage have to yolo it and do things that would've killed him.

but  to escape the castle the mage have to"YOLO it"and do things that would've killed him normally

Controls:

A,D: Movement

Space: Jump

E: Interact

Esc: Menu, Settings, Quit

R: Restart Level

Enter: Next level (Only works if you finished this level before and replaying it.)
